storyInfo: Thanks to a lack of supplies, the sailors prepare to take Thorns out saltfin hunting. Juana appears to be hiding some dread secret having to do with the Seaborn.

attributes.content: ...A ship's log?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You recognize that?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: It's something mariners used to use to record what happened on their voyages.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: So, you seen a lot of this sorta thing?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: ...SÃ­. My teacher taught me many things.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Must've had guts to do that.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: So are you going to stand behind me and commentate all day, or...?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Think it was my idea, chaval? Bosun told me to keep a close eye on you.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: I'm sure you can do that without literally breathing down my neck.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: That sound... I know that sound...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro looks around vigilantly, warned by the sound on the salt wind. Behind the sailor, he sees a familiar dent appear on the surface of the salt.
Out of the way! Saltfin incoming!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You got finshit for brains?!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Mreep... Mreep...
attributes.name: Saltfin

attributes.content: You shoved me aside for this?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: You think it was one of them giant saltfins or something?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Shut up...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: If it were, the whole ground'd be shaking. One of these small fry just leaves a little dent is all.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Besides, they're the same sorta critter as Nene. What's it gonna do, cuddle you to death?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: What's that crazy puta even need from a guy as stupid as you, anyway?!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Mmph...
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Mreep...
attributes.name: Saltfin

attributes.content: They're... the same species?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mreep...
attributes.name: Saltfin

attributes.content: So there's more than one variety of saltfin out here?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Yep. About ten or so types, big and small.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Some of your sails are made from leather. Are they...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Saltfin hide. Also use it for tents.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: And the meat you hang out to dry outside...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Saltfin meat.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Your weapons...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Saltfin bones.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: And those guys are...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mmph...
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Mreep...
attributes.name: Saltfin

attributes.content: They ain't the same. Won't hurt 'em unless we really have to.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: The crazy puta loves 'em to death. Once tried to haul some aboard to raise them, but a day away from their friends and they lose all the spirit. She had to give up that loco plan.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Then why's that one part of the crew?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mm-ph.
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Nene was abandoned by its mates. Couldn't keep up with 'em thanks to its weak body. Lucky for it, she went and picked it up.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Cheep...
attributes.name: Saltfin

attributes.content: Mm-ph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: They're leaving?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That's normal. They don't stay in one place for too long.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: One after the other, the saltfins drill into the salt, speeding off into the distance.
Their tracks lace and intertwine, leaving the salt surface looking like a cracked mirror.
They fascinate Isidro. He climbs up on a jagged rock, hoping to get a better look at the where the cracks are headed from a higher vantage point.
He stands at its peak, and to his surprise, he sees an immense gash barreling towards them, swallowing up any salt reefs or skeletons in its path.
He realizes the saltfins weren't leaving. They were fleeing.
(Runs around anxiously)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: No... That's definitely not normal.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You see something?!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Move! Quickly!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: In an instant, the ground splits into a gaping maw, threatening to devour the two as they sprint away.
Cesc stumbles as he tries to flee, the collapsing earth grabbing at his ankle. He screams in terror.
Isidro grabs hold of his arm, but he soon finds out he is powerless against nature's brute strength.
Just as the two are about to be swallowed whole, the collapse miraculously stops. The sailor's lower leg is wedged tight between the jagged earth, now nothing more than a bloody, mangled mess.
The hell's going on over there?!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: The salt split open! I think someone fell in!
attributes.name: Flustered Sailor

attributes.content: Go have a look then, quick!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I'll be going now.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Get back here, you capullo! Don't even think about running!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Hey... Don't leave me here by myself...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Mm... hmph...
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Your crewmates will be over soon. You'll be fine.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Wh... Where are you going?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: (Nips at Isidro's pants)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Not sure. Somewhere you can't find me.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...NâNo... You can't go.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Bosun's... orders... I... have to keep an eye on you.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: *Glub*â!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: I haven't been here to see you for so long...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: All is going according to plan.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Yes, we've taken a few risks, but they were worth it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Soon we will set our sails once more, and return to the ocean's embrace.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Are you happy for me?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The sound of metal scraping against stone echoes out from the cave, followed by a slender Seaborn slowly slithering its way out, its form warped and twisted.
Each of its tentacles is wrapped around a weapon. As their points and edges drag across the stone walls, they keen and wail.
It slowly approaches the saltfin meat, and slowly eats away at it, its eyes fixed on Juana the entire time.
She meets its gaze, quietly waiting for the Seaborn's reply.
But in her heart, she knows that it is no more than a beast, a beast without a speck of intellect or humanity.
We will leave this place, this desert of salt. No matter the price.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana turns and exits the cave, leaving behind only the Seaborn, trashing around like a caged animal now that it has finished its meal.
Rocks fall from the ceiling until finally, it ceases its struggle for a way out, slowly calming down in the darkness.
Dios mio... What happened here? Did that boy do this?!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: NâNo, it was my fault... BâBut he ran away...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Forget him! You lot come over and help pull him out.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: AHHHH! MY LEG!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Bosun, his leg...
attributes.name: Flustered Sailor

attributes.content: Speak up!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: IâI don't think we can save it! We need to call the surgeon!
attributes.name: Flustered Sailor

attributes.content: When's the last time we had a surgeon...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: But only a surgeon'd know how to cut it off right! Else he'll bleed to death!
attributes.name: Flustered Sailor

attributes.content: I don't wanna die here...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Save me, bosun! Save me!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Cesc... I...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I'm here. I know what to do.
Chaval...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: He'll live. I guarantee it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Good. Get over here.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Bite down on the hilt. Hard.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Grkh...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: This'll sting a little. Just bear with it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: GKKHHHâ!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Thorns!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How could they do you dirty like this on your own wanted poster? What's with that picture?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Why are you so quick to concede that it's Thorns now? Weren't you just insisting it was all a mistaken identity?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What if those bandits forced him into it? Or maybe he was framed? He's not much of a talker. I can definitely see him putting his foot in his mouth while explaining himself.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If he is the upstanding young man you say he is, then surely he's dead by now, killed by either the bandits or by the dangers of the Salt Flat.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: No... What exactly would they do to him?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: They like to... No, you would be happier not knowing.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: We've done all we can to keep them away from town, but they've still managed to abduct some of our best and brightest.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Their leader is a vile monster, able to corrupt the hearts of others.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Time to start cooking... Hmm? Who touched my kitchen?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: (Cautious sniff)
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: That smell... It's coming from the pot over there...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Stewed fin hearts? This is SeÃ±ora Juana's specialty.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: But they went bad ages ago. Better put that fire out.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: During the Profound Silence, most of AarÃ³n was submerged under the sea. Only this small part atop the hill avoided that grim fate, but it too shortly fell to chaos as the harvest failed.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: The pirates sailed in before the seawater retreated. They claimed they would bring order to AarÃ³n.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But in truth, they only wished to burn, kill and maim, forcing the townsfolk to surrender to their reign of terror.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Everything they saw was put to the torch...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Fire! HELP! FIRE! The pot blew up!
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Mierda! Why's there a fire here?!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Javier, you dried-out piece of finshit! How many times do I have to tell you NOT to let this useless cockeyed bastard in the kitchen until he gets some glasses?!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Ohh... It was fin oil... Sorry, was all blurry to me!
attributes.name: Shortsighted Sailor

attributes.content: Out of my sight, dumbass!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: âWhere the hell's Javier? Get over here and put out this fire already!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Quick, cover it with salt!
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Ahh! My clothes! I just sewed up that finleather coat!
attributes.name: Frightened Sailor

attributes.content: ...Mmm... Roast finleather smells... pretty good...
attributes.name: Hungry Sailor

attributes.content: Even if he is lucky enough to be alive, the bandits themselves live harsh lives in the wastes. Surely they wouldn't treat their captives well. He's most likely dying of hunger and thirst at this very moment.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Are you alright, Elysium?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm fine... SeÃ±or Calificador, please, continue.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Needless to say, we can only pray he does nothing to incur their wrath.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Their punishments are as barbaric as they are capricious. They'll slit open bellies or chop off hands and feet over the slightest offense...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: To think they'd twist the law like that...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: SâSlit open bellies or chop off hands and feet, you say...?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: AHHHâHHHHH!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Hah... Hah...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Get some rum! Give him a swig!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Rus! Rus! How's my leg...?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Alright... Lie down, and stay calm...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Your leg's still out in the Flat. It won't hurt any longer.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: We've been looking after you here, Cesc. Don't worry, the surgery was a success. You won't be dying today.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Oh... Oh...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: I just cut his leg off. I can't call it surgery.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: He's alive. That's surgery enough for us.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Calm down, Elysium. There's nothing to suggest that these bandits have killed him.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I don't want to think too much about the possibility, but... where would we even go to find out?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Weedy does not answer. In the distance, several corpses hang from a pole outside of town, swinging in the wind.
A fowl lands atop it, feasting on the carrion.
Oh, you two are guests of the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Pious Townsperson

attributes.content: Those were bandits caught by the Alguacil. They were hanged, all according to the teachings.
attributes.name: Pious Townsperson

attributes.content: Their bodies will serve as a warning to others of their kind.
attributes.name: Tranquil Townsperson

attributes.content: Dead if you stick with the bandits, dead if you come back looking like a bandit...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Thorns...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hey, joven, you still want that paper you're holding?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Nah, I don't need it anymore. Here, take it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Gracias. Finally found something to stick my bed together with.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Hmm? Isn't this...
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: What, have you seen him before?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Of course I have. I even sheltered him for a night.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: The fleet's heading out into the flat to hunt saltfins in a few days, and I'd like the boy to come along.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: We've lost a lot of men this month, and our surgeon and navigator sacrificed themselves to get us out of the Inquisition's trap. I think he can fill in for their posts.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: That's how you plan to fix our manpower problem?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I only let him help on the salvage ship because of Teach's guarantee, but did he not almost run away today?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: And now you're telling me you want him to join you on a finship.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: SeÃ±ora... I know he's a precious, precious alchemist, but he's great with a sword too and knows his medicine. He'll be real handy during a hunt.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You might as well open the door and let him leave. He'll find no shortage of opportunities to escape out there.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm a pirate, Rus. We're not the most kind-hearted sort.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Please, seÃ±ora, we've lost way too many men in these last few tussles with the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You're not the only one in this fleet who needs him... We all do.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: He's far from a good little boy, you know. In fact, he's rather naughty. How will you ensure he does as he's told?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: He'd never met Pascuala before, but he still saved her sorry behind when the Inquisition was chasing her down, and saw her safely to town. Didn't ask for a reward, neither.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: He could've left Cesc to die, but he didn't. Chose to come back and help us save him.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: He... He's a good kid. An honest kid.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: As long as we show him how much we need him, he won't just sit back and watch us suffer.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Any other news from the crew?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Nothing yet... Nothing about our food supplies for the next month, at least.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Fine, he can go with you.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: So the boy was your friend, then?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: A fine young man. Such a shame what happened... And in the prime of his youth...
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Alright, alright, fine!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm going to go find him myself!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Elysium? Elysium!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Weedy, Thorns is definitely out there, waiting for us to save him!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Here, a communicator. You stay in town, I'll head out into the Salt Flat.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Huh... Wha...?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If anything happens here, contact me! We'll keep in touchâ
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Take careâ
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ELYSIUM!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Wait for me, Thorns! I'm coming!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Why do you kids never let me finish?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: You were trying to say...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It's a shame a fine young man like that would come back to Iberia just to learn a bit of swordplay.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Wouldn't it be better to live out the rest of your days in some other country?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: This bread is... burnt.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Should still be edible, at least.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That bunch of useless pricks... I'll cave their skulls in one day, mark my words.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Lucky we didn't lose too much.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: (*chews*)
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Why're you snacking on a lump of charcoal?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Because I'm hungry.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Toss that out and come with me.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You've got a lot to learn afore you can join a finship crew.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Finship? What finship?
attributes.name: Isidro
